## ChatCoreZendesk.init() method

Initialize the Amazon Connect chat session using the credentials from the Chat API.

**Signature:**

```typescript
init(messageResponse: MessageResponse): Promise<ChatCoreZendeskSessionCredentials>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  messageResponse | MessageResponse | The response returned from a successful call to the Chat API. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;ChatCoreZendeskSessionCredentials&gt;
